column4: woot woot just reached 100,000 files, when will it stop? nobody knows!
why cant i just install fuppes
im going to shoot myself in the head, after the creator of ffmpeg and fuppes
fuppes?
wow it finally stopped around 140k files
upnp media server that works with xbox360
aah
the package on the site says it was built in 2007 but the svn is recent but when i run make i get ffmpeg errors
there's another one...
!info ushare
try ushare
i dont think ushare works with xbox360 yet
it worked with the 360 a few years ago, why not now?
i didnt know it did, i was just going by what i read
I've used it, I'm pretty sure it works, I wouldn't recommend it unless I knew for a fact that it does.  try it, see what happens.
*doesn't
ushare doesnt have a gui does it?
nope, just a config file - make a dir, point it at it, startit up, and it should "just work", as long as the config is set correctly
i mean i dont mind if it doesnt, just curious
can you organize your folders with links/shortcuts?
or just through the config file?
!es | alejandro_09
it does have a web interface, actually
